forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 40F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 33F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 31F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
